article_title: Q&A: Denise Gonick, MVP Health Care CEO
article_text: After a tumultuous period of health care reform, skyrocketing medical costs and staff reductions, MVP Health Care is adding jobs and its leader is excited about yearslong initiatives that are finally bearing fruit. CEO Denise V. Gonick said given the scope of her industry, and all the work that must go into internal changes, efforts to change direction do not take place in a single year, and do not show results the next year. article_metadata.description: The Daily Gazette - Schenectady, NY. Locally owned voice of the capital region.

og.description: After a tumultuous period of health care reform, skyrocketing medical costs and staff reductions, MVP Health Care is adding jobs and its leader is excited about yearslong initiatives that are finally bearing fruit.
og.title: Q&A: Denise Gonick, MVP Health Care CEO

article_summary:
After a tumultuous period of health care reform, skyrocketing medical costs and staff reductions, MVP Health Care is adding jobs and its leader is excited about yearslong initiatives that are finally bearing fruit.
CEO Denise V. Gonick said given the scope of her industry, and all the work that must go into internal changes, efforts to change direction do not take place in a single year, and do not show results the next year.
